Player History
Drafted in 2nd round, 37th overall pick, by Tampa Bay in 2011...
Traded from Tampa Bay to New York (A) on 7/7/2011 (Going to TB: RF J. Hermida. Going to NYA: P J. Vazquez, SS M. Semien)...
Traded from New York (A) to Chicago (A) on 2/8/2014 (Going to CHA: SS M. Semien, 1B M. Skole. Going to NYA: SS H. Ramirez)...
Traded from Chicago (A) to Toronto on 2/12/2015 (Going to CHA: 1B D. Cooper. Going to TOR: 2B M. Semien)...
Had first career hit (double) on 7/19/2015, off Jimmy Gobble (MIL)...
Hit first career homerun on 8/6/2015, off Stephen Sharpe (BOS)...
Had 5 hits with 3 RBI against Baltimore on 5/1/2016...
Had 5 hits with 1 RBI against New York (A) on 6/7/2016...
Was selected to the 2016 Allstar game...
Had 5 hits with 5 RBI against Boston on 9/4/2016...
Won Player of the Week award on 9/10/2016, hitting .391 with 3 HR, 10 RBI...
Won Player of the Week award on 9/24/2016, hitting .583 with 6 HR, 10 RBI...
Won Batter of the Month award on 10/1/2016, hitting .346 with 12 HR, 32 RBI...
Had 5 hits with 3 RBI against Baltimore on 5/6/2018...
Drove in 8 runs against Tampa Bay on 8/16/2019...
Won Player of the Week award on 8/19/2019, hitting .370 with 4 HR, 12 RBI...
Won Player of the Week award on 8/30/2021, hitting .481 with 2 HR, 6 RBI...
Traded from Toronto to Washington on 6/19/2022 (Going to WSH: 2B M. Semien. Going to TOR: SS J. Peterson, LF R. Woolverton, P K. Williams)...
Traded from Washington to New York (A) on 7/31/2023 (Going to NYA: 2B M. Semien. Going to WSH: 2B M. Wimbush, P J. Oritz)...
